description: Police are investigating a spate of letter-bomb attacks on companies across the Netherlands.
title: Dutch letter-bomb blackmail campaign targets companies
title_page: Dutch letter-bomb blackmail campaign targets companies - BBC News
maintext: The blackmail campaign is similar to a rash of attacks on a Dutch supermarket chain in 2015. Three bombs were planted and a letter bomb was sent through the post alongside a succession of encrypted emails demanding payment in the virtual cryptocurrency Bitcoin.
